thread.title: Bruce Willis Is Entering His Hipster Dad Phase
thread.title_full: Bruce Willis Is Entering His Hipster Dad Phase -- The Cut

author: Dayna Evans
title: Bruce Willis Is Entering His Hipster Dad Phase
text:
'Sup, kids? Photo: Doug Meszler/PacificCoastNews
Bruce Willis is the sixty-year-old father of five daughters, but from the looks of his neatly looped scarf and strategically unbuttoned plaid shirt, you could never tell. Seen out in New York City on Thursday after performing in his stage play, Misery , Willis was heard saying that he couldnâ€™t wait for the new Death Trap For Cutie album and that he thinks "kombucha is really on flickety fleek."
Daaaa .
